participant_1.background:
I enjoy watching cooking videos but am not very good at cooking myself.
sometimes i feel like i have already been through life once before.
i work as a meeting coordinator.
I went to the beach and relaxed.
I make sure to spend time with my family after a long day of rehearsals.

participant_2.background:
In my spare time, I refine my skills and craft my own clothing.
my mom is a painter.
I am an aspiring journalist with a passion for food and a knack for storytelling.
my mother looks after my grandmother.
i go fishing on the weekends to relax.

content.text: What do you like to do in your spare time?
I love to refine my skills and craft my own clothing.
That sounds really cool, what kind of clothing do you make?
I make all sorts of things, but mostly skirts and dresses.
Wow, that's amazing! I could never do something like that.
I'm sure you could! It just takes some practice.
I've tried sewing before, but I'm not very good at it.
Well, if you ever want to learn, I'd be happy to teach you.
That's so kind of you! I might just take you up on that.
Anytime!
So, what do you do for work?
I'm an aspiring journalist, but I'm also a meeting coordinator for a law firm.
Oh, that's interesting. Do you like working in a law firm?
It's okay. It's not my dream job, but it pays the bills.
Well, I'm sure you'll eventually get your dream job.
Thanks! I hope so.
What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I love to go fishing, read, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read too.
Me too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy.
I love historical fiction too! I've been reading a lot of books about the American Civil War lately.
Oh, that sounds really interesting! I've never read any books about the Civil War.
You should definitely check them out! They're really good.
I will! I love to learn new things.
Me too
